|brand = Sagemcom |model = F@ST 3686 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = V2.2 |subrevision = (HP) |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC1600 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router,cable modem, |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = VW3FAST3686, VW3FAST3686V2H |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM3384ZU;QAMLink (R), BCM3384ZUKFSBG, CA1713 P20, 09A-39 N3A1 W; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = MIPS |cpu1_type_rev = BMIPS5000 |cpu1spd = 1.5 GHz <!-- 500 / 800 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX30LF1G18AC-XKI; |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 256 |ram1chip = Samsung;K4B2G1646F-BCMA; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Broadcom;BCM53134S;BCM53134SKFBG,TN1710 P21, 488-12 P3 W; |cm_down_c = 24 |cm_up_c = 8 |docsisver = 3.0 |voip_ports = |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:19:70 |oui = 00:19:70
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0 |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = DOCSIS 3.0, DFS (master), |addchip = 5GHz Front End Module;Skyworks;SKY85712-21;SKY21, 85712, 711WB;3; ,,, Wideband Tuner;Broadcom;BCM3184;P30, 3184LG, TE1716, 046;1; ,,, Wideband Amplifier;NXP;BGU7045;;1; ,,, Dual Channel Ringing SLIC;Zarlink;Le9540;9540DUQC, JA(e3), 1706MBG;1; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 01/02/2018 |estreldate = 11/2016 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4360;BCM4360KMLG, TE1701 P20, 401-04 3 W; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 3 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 3 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |acqam1 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad1ac = 1300 |rad1n = 450 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 5 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43217;BCM43217KMLG, TD1635 P11, 642180-02 1 W; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam2 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad2n = 300 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4 |rad2correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad2cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "FAST3686 SFR_REV.04" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
* DOCSIS 3.0 24x8 channels
==Links of Interest== :[http://www.sagemcom.com/broadband/gateways/home-connectivity/fst-3686-ac/ Product page] (AC) {{•}} [http://sagemcom.ru/item_110.htm Product page] (RU)
===Forum threads=== *[http://forum.akado.ru/index.php/topic/55220-sagemcom-fst3686-v22-eurodocsis30-роутер-с-dbc-wifi/ ''Sagemcom F@ST 3686'' on '''akado.ru''' forums] :CPU: [[Broadcom]] [https://www.broadcom.com/products/broadband/cable/modems/bcm3384#overview BCM3384] - DOCSIS 3.0 SoC (FBC/DECT) :WLAN 5GHz: [[Broadcom]] [https://www.broadcom.com/products/wireless/wireless-lan-infrastructure/bcm4360 BCM4360] - 3T3R 802.11an/ac :WLAN 2.4GHz: [[Broadcom]] BCM43217 - 2T2R 802.11bgn

*[[Sagemcom F@ST 4320HP]] • Wireless xDSL Bonding Router :FCC ID: VW3FAST4320HP (2015-09-15) *[[Sagemcom F@ST 3486]] • Cable Gateway :FCC ID: VW3FAST3486 (2015-05-21) *[[Sagemcom F@ST 3284U]] • Cable Modem :FCC ID: VW3FAST3284U (2014-12-01) *[[Sagemcom F@ST 4350]] • Wireless xDSL Router :FCC ID: VW3FAST4350 (2014-03-20) *[[Sagemcom F@ST 5260]] • Home Router :FCC ID: VW3FAST5260 (2014-03-12) *[[Sagemcom F@ST 5250]] • Router :FCC ID: VW3FAST5250 (2014-02-20) *[[Sagemcom F@ST 5260CV]] • Home Router :FCC ID: VW3FAST5260CV (2014-01-22)
